title: U.S.- employment by industry 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Employment in thousands for 13 number of Industrys.
Industry Education and health services has the highest Employment in thousands and Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction has the lowest Employment in thousands.
There is a difference of 35144.0 between the maximum Industry Education and health services and minimum Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Employment in thousands for 13 number of Industrys.
The Employment in thousands is highest at Industry Education and health services and lowest at Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Employment in thousands for 13 number of Industrys.
Industry Education and health services has the highest Employment in thousands and Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction has the lowest Employment in thousands.
There is a difference of 35144.0 between the maximum Industry Education and health services and minimum Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Industry in the x axis and Employment in thousands in the y axis.
The Employment in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Industry Education and health services and lowest at Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.
Second maximum Employment in thousands is found at Industry Wholesale and retail trade.
The highest Industry Education and health services has 35144.0 more Employment in thousands than the lowest Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction.

Industry Education and health services is higher than any other Industrys with value 35894.0, followed by Wholesale and retail trade, and Professional and business services. Down to Industry Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction with the lowest value 750.0.
The average Employment in thousands in all 13 Industrys is 12118.31.

data.Industry: Mining quarrying and oil and gas extraction
